text: Zalmai Rassoul (born 11 May 1943Ministers of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan) is an Afghan politician. He served as Foreign Minister of Afghanistan from January 2010 to October 2013. He resigned in October 2013 to run for president. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan politicians Category:People from Kabul Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Zalmai Rassoul
